content: crochet a mini potion bottle with this quick and easy pattern this is a no-sew pattern with just a few ends to weave in make either a love potion or poison bottle simply by changing up the colours the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy **materials** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * polyester fiberfill * optional small charms or beads for decorating * yarn needle stitch marker scissors the finished item measure approximately 2 75 7cm tall item size may vary depending on the materials used
